title: Citi Central America Presents Private Pass
summary: Miami, Florida - Citibank credit card clients in Central America can now make their trips to the United States even more unforgettable with exclusive access to Private Pass, Citi's U.S. entertainment program.
tag-1: Citi Central America Presents Private Pass
tag-3: Miami, Florida – Citibank credit card clients in Central America can now make their trips to the United States even more unforgettable with exclusive access to Private Pass, Citi's U.S. entertainment program.
tag-4: Private Pass is a website that gives access to the entertainment program enjoyed by all Citi credit and debit card customers in the United States, now available to credit card clients in Central America as well. The site opens the door to countless options for concerts, plays, sports events, family activities, restaurants and more in the United States.
tag-5: "Citi Central America cardholders who want to see Madonna or Lady Gaga in concert, or visit a professional baseball stadium with David Ortiz, can do so with Private Pass, which offers a wide range of options, including VIP seats, advance ticket sales for exclusive events, backstage passes and more. Private Pass access is free, and using benefits is quick and easy," commented Luis Marín, Retail Banking Director, Citi Central America.
tag-6: Private Pass allows cardholders to pay for tickets for the event of their choosing directly with their Citi credit card and take advantage of special free offers.
tag-7: "At Citi Central America, we want to redefine the banking experience with our global and digital banking capability. Giving Citi credit card customers in Central America access to an exclusive U.S. benefit website is just another indication of our ongoing commitment to offer a global experience," added Ana Maria Rojas, Director of Credit Cards, Citi Latin America.
tag-8: The service is part of Citi's Benefits Program, which offers clients in every country in Central America discounts, Multipremios mile accumulation and redemption, travel miles and exclusive promotions. For more information about eligible events, Citi Central America clients should consult the Private Pass website.
